Obvious and straightforward. Couple of hints....try to develop pieces. You saw in the latter half of our match that I was chasing you around a lot. true I was taking pieces but nowhere near mating you. It wasn't until I brought more material in I was able to get a mating position. Rem he who controls the middle 16 squares controls the game....get those bishops and knights moving!
